artefact: Expenses and benefits: cash prizes for employer-run competitions

artefact.alternative_title: Employer's tax and reporting for cash prizes in employer-run competitions
artefact.overview: Tax and reporting rules for employers running cash prize competitions for employees
artefact.body:
Cash prizes for any competitions you run that are only open to your employees count as earnings. As an employer, you don’t need to report these payments to HMRC.

You will need to:

  • add the amount to your employee’s other earnings
  • deduct and pay PAYE tax and Class 1 National Insurance through payroll
